about_the_game:
Bloody Hills is an intense and heart-pounding survival horror game set in the depths of a secluded forest camp. As night falls, you find yourself trapped in a twisted game of cat and mouse with a relentless killer known as The Hiker. Armed with only your wits and limited resources, you must fight to survive until dawn while evading the sadistic clutches of this merciless predator.

The campgrounds, once a place of serenity and camaraderie, have been transformed into a sinister playground for The Hiker. As you navigate the dense woods, your heart races with every creaking branch and distant rustle. The oppressive atmosphere envelops you, amplifying your fear and heightening your senses.

The Hiker, a hulking figure obscured by a mask, lurks within the shadows, patiently waiting for the perfect moment to strike. He is a relentless stalker, constantly monitoring your movements, and observing every mistake you make. His presence is marked by a brutal and chilling soundtrack, a constant reminder of the danger that awaits.

To survive, you must complete various tasks to improve your slim chances of survival, while also trying to evade contact with The Hiker, do you dare to face this man?

Features:
  • Beautiful but horrifying ambiance and level design
  • Complex AI
  • An intense but deep soundtrack
